snippet: Raulie Casteel, who shot at two dozen vehicles along a highway in southeastern Michigan, was sentenced on Monday to 16 to 40 years for terrorism.
lead_paragraph: Raulie Casteel, who shot at two dozen vehicles along a highway in southeastern Michigan, was sentenced on Monday to 16 to 40 years for terrorism.

headline.main: Michigan: Second Sentence for Man Who Shot at Cars
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Second Sentence For Man Who Shot at Cars
